Privacy Policy

The Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineering (IEEE) is an International organization, which has been the nexus for propagating scientific expertise among people all over the globe. IEEE continues to attract students, faculty and professionals from various fields all around the world and is committed to incorporating diversity in thoughts which is essential for scientific development. IEEE serves as a hub to many engineering students and faculty members for expressing their technical acuity to the world and has always been at the forefront of the technical revolution.

Code is like humor. When you have to explain it, it\’s bad.
Here's an opportunity to divulge into the intricacies of competitive coding.
PISB brings you NCC (National Computing Contest).
NCC is a platform where you can not only test your logical acuity but also explore your coding skills.
So, get ready to brainstorm your knowledge of C and C++ to code, compile and resolve.


Date: Friday, 25th Feburary, 2019. 
Venue: Pune Institute of Computer Technology (PICT), Pune. 

Registration Fee:
 IEEE Member: ₹100 
Non-IEEE Member: ₹80

 A team of Maximum 2 people.

Note: No need for laptops, we've got it covered.

For further details, contact:
 Tanmay Nale: 
+91-99691 08722 

Saumitra Kulkarni: 
+91-8806850222

Network Treasure Hunt is an online Treasure Hunt played across the globe. Read between the lines, delve into their secrets, and seek out the answer. Make use of anything that you think will help. Even with Google and Wikipedia by your side, it\'s going to be fun and challenging.
A journey which guarantees to leave you with a thirst for more. Bring out the Sherlock in you as The Game Is On!

For more details, contact:
 Shreya Lanjewar: 
+91-8999412539 

Piyusha Gumte: 
+91-7745000663

Here\’s the opportunity for all of you to put your minds to test, as you rack your brains in InQUIZitive!
It's a General Quiz open for FE, SE, TE, and BE.
Pull up your sleeves and battle out against sharp-witted minds.
Note the details below:


Day and Date: Tuesday, 15th January, 2019.

Venue: Computer Seminar Hall.


Registration Fee: 
IEEE Members: ₹30/- 
Non-IEEE Members: ₹50/-


If taking up a challenge is your thing, we'll see you at InQUIZitive!

Prepare your pirate ship! Assemble your crew of musketeers! Haul up your flags!
PISB presents UNRAVEL!
So detect through your Jones eyes Sharpen your logic sword Get your Sherlock minds and race against the explorers to quest the ultimate treasure by unveiling the hidden clues.


 Date: 22nd February, 2019 
 Time: 4:30 pm onwards 

Fee: IEEE members: ₹30 Non-IEEE members: ₹50
